Articles.Content:
Huzzah - I can finally contribute ... words ... to this splendid game. I already succeeded with circling the planet ... i failed to recognise the landmass i started from, though, and instead crashed landed my capsule somewhere that might be near the spaceport. I hope. Eh...

WELL! Anyways ... Let the Hand-shaking begin!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
